headline: Zacks.com featured highlights include Universal Health Services, PNC Financial Services, Global Payments and BioMarin Pharmaceutical
summary: Universal Health Services anchors a Zacks value screen as low price-to-cash-flow stocks gain appeal amid policy uncertainty.

headline: Has Global Payments (GPN) Fallen Too Far After A 28% Share Price Slide?
summary: Wondering if Global Payments is a bargain or a value trap at around US$77.48? This article walks through what the current price may be implying about the stock. Over the past year the share price has fallen by about 28.1%, and over 5 years it has declined about 57.6%. This may have some investors asking whether sentiment has moved too far. Recent coverage has focused on Global Payments as a major player in merchant acquiring and payment technology, and how its position in digital...
